#include <iostream>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,n,a,b,i,j,ans,x,y;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	scanf("%d",&n);
	scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
	ans = 0;
	while(n--)
	{
	   scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
	   ans = ans+2*(abs(a-x)+abs(b-y));
	
	}

	}

}
